content: Yeah, that sounds like a good idea. I think I'll also add the trip name to the file name, so it's clear which trip the photo belongs to. Like "20220215_Napa Valley_Getaway_Wine Tasting at Castello di Amorosa.jpg" or "20220520_Yosemite_Road Trip_Half Dome from Glacier Point.jpg". That way, I can easily sort my photos by trip and location.
